website_summaries.verdict: A solidly-constructed flask that gets high marks for protecting its contents from discoloration, although you should take care when screwing the cap on and off.
pros: Doesn’t seem to discolor contents, unlike some other stainless steel flasks
Choice of matte black or stainless steel finishes
cons: The small funnel size is difficult to use
Hinge holding the cap can easily break, and the cap itself can become cross-threaded, which can lead to leaks

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this flask
customer_reviews.text: I've gone through several low-end flasks and none can compare to this one. The 18/8 food grade stainless steel is safe and doesn't seem to show any signs of corrosion or scaling. I usually keep whiskey in it for no more than 3 days at a time. I haven't noticed any change in taste. Afterwards, I empty it out and flush with white vinegar and warm distilled water, then dry upside down. Just as a test, I flush it one more time with distilled water and pour it into a cup to check for particles. So far, so good! It's well worth the money to drink clean, uncontaminated spirits.
customer_reviews.author: Kona408

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking flask
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking flask. Fair price. Only negative is that the bottom of the flask is slightly rounded and therefore wobbles a bit when sitting. Need to lean it against something for more stability. Can't figure out why they made it that way.
customer_reviews.author: Seal8

customer_reviews.title: Stylish & practical stainless steel flask
customer_reviews.text: I bought this flask for my husband as a birthday present. He had received one many years ago from a nephew, but had it in his back pocket, forgot it was there, and sat on it. The middle area was flatten so it was hard to use. I also had it engraved with his initials by a local engraving business. He loved it. He lost the tiny funnel from the first one so having the top attached and the funnel has made it so much easier to use, keep with him, and enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but adds a funny flavor that’s impossible to get rid of.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: looks great, good price, doesn’t leak. Cons: the cap retainer pivot is at an angle that makes it a little difficult to screw the cap on without cross threading it. It should be slightly angled so that the cap defaults to level with the threads. No matter what cleaning methods I’ve tried this flask imparts a strange and unpleasant flavor to the contents.
customer_reviews.author: D. Armer

customer_reviews.title: Hootch on the Go!
customer_reviews.text: Stylish and leak proof so far - no noticeable aftertaste on your beverages. A little pesky to fill and clean with the small opening, but comes with a funnel for the refill so all good. Size is discreet so you can have a little bracer as needed almost anywhere! Church, parent-teacher conferences, job interviews - you get the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Mayor Tommy Shanks

customer_reviews.title: Love my flask.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I like to carry a bottle of water while hiking, birding, etc. Plastic bottles and reusables are round, and my back pocket abuts a part of me that’s also round. This flask is 8 oz., just right for a moderat walk, and it matches my contours, fitting my pocket perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: NICE!
customer_reviews.text: I have mine full of Crown, stuffed into an admen pouch on my BugOut Bag. This thing is well worth the money if you ever wanted a flask. And it is leak proof. Mine has been on its side for a month and no leakage so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff LeMond

customer_reviews.title: Quallity
customer_reviews.text: just picked this product up today , looks great am going to get them engraved with my daughters names as a Christmas gift think i'll have to buy 1 for myself they look so good Cheers DG
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Fine flask but discolored our liquid in a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: The flask worked out great for the few times we used it camping. It never leaked from what we saw. However, we left bourbon in it from our last camping trip in August and two months later, the bourbon was discolored (blackish) and tasted metallic. We ended up throwing this away as we couldn’t get the metallic taste out of anything new put inside. I wouldn’t have expected this from a decent grade stainless steel. So this is probably fine if you don’t store anything it it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason C Cordell

customer_reviews.title: Quality flask - tightly sealed and durable, funnel included
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality flask. It is tightly sealed and durable. I have heard that some cheap flasks contaminate and discolor the alcohol inside them. This flask does not do this, thankfully. The included flask funnel is a great bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: great flask
customer_reviews.text: It is American steel, which is really important to me for safety - especially since you put alcohol in it. I also like that it is 8 oz instead of just 6
customer_reviews.author: Shardan

customer_reviews.title: Sharp!
customer_reviews.text: My old flask started leaking so it was time to buy a new one. It came in an attractive box, perfect for giving as a gift. Very happy with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Stay away--will alter & ruin the taste of your beverage
customer_reviews.text: Just returned this. I bought it because it's half the price of the Von Wulf flask -- which it closely resembles (and which I recommend) -- two of which I'd lost over the years. I adequately washed it before using. Yet it completely altered the taste of the Jack stored within--rendering it completely undrinkable. I then tested it by rewashing & soaking overnight. Poured some cold water in it--it altered the taste of the water. You will end up returning this--you've been warned.
customer_reviews.author: Litigation Search

customer_reviews.title: Cap holding attachment only glued on
customer_reviews.text: The cap attachment (the reason why I chose it) snapped off less than two months after buying it. Turned out It was glued on rather than being spot welded to the metal flask. I like the flask, but not a big fan of its shoddy construction.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Goins

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, well made
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, well made, good welds, and food grade stainless steel is a huge plus. My last flask made by Coleman rusted on the inside and was leaching god knows what into my whiskey... So gross. My only complaint is that the bottom of the one I got is convex and it's pretty wobbly if I set it on a flat surface. It seems like that's not an issue for every one else so maybe I just got unlucky. Otherwise, great flask.
customer_reviews.author: I R Meyers

customer_reviews.title: LEAKS but looks pretty sharp.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, really top notch. BUT it leaks. Which is really lame. Kept it in my pocket and 5 minutes later my pocket was soaked with whiskey. Re tightened the screw lid and it still leaked. It leaks from the cap area. Really a bummer because it’s a great looking flask but I can’t use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great present
customer_reviews.text: Was an Xmas gift for a 20-something. he loved it and the Matte black looks cool and classy!
customer_reviews.author: Jtfleur

customer_reviews.title: Not a very refined product, but it will deliver alcohol where you need it to go.
customer_reviews.text: Very rough seems around all of the edges of this flask. It hasn’t leaked at all, and I will continue to use it, but it not of very high standards when it comes to fit and finish.
customer_reviews.author: TheChrisCarman

customer_reviews.title: Cant touch this!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing piece regardless of the great price. So far no taste, but I've been pretty good about emptying it shortly after filling it ;). I plan to gift many of this unit to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Wile E. Chrudinsky

customer_reviews.title: A very good and well made product
customer_reviews.text: This is well made. If your in the market purchase this.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt B.

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be good quality stainless got it filled with some good ole ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be good quality stainless got it filled with some good ole moonshine. Well it was full at one point. The only thing that don’t seem like it will last is the hindge on the lid but I really like it overall.
customer_reviews.author: AngryBiker

customer_reviews.title: Good flask but needs transparency
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy design but hard to refill without overspilling due to inability to see level of content
customer_reviews.author: Boni Wan Kenobi

customer_reviews.title: great flask!
customer_reviews.text: Well built flask. Love the brushed finish to it. The cap portion of this flask is stronger than most flasks that you pay around 10 or 15 dollars for anyways that are made in China. Worth the money spent +1
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: It does stand upright but a touch wobbly (which is not a big deal for us) I liked it so much I bought more as gift
customer_reviews.text: Left a liquor in it for days to test it - no change in taste or color ! (as expected) Truly leak proof. It does stand upright but a touch wobbly (which is not a big deal for us) I liked it so much I bought more as gift.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: The listing talks it up good, but it's meh
customer_reviews.text: The listing talks it up good, but it's meh. Big ugly seems, typical quality, certainly nothing special or even nice. If it wouldn't come almost half the price to return it I would.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: More leaks than the Trump administration
customer_reviews.text: Pros: it looks nice, and is relatively inexpensive. Cons: 1 hour into holding liquid, it started leaking from the bottom corners. Not so premium after all.
customer_reviews.author: greenbean

customer_reviews.title: The funnel works well do it at a slight angle and it's great, the temperature of the flask won't stay cold ...
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. It's water tight, the cap cross threads so it's kind of a pain if your already drunk trying to put the cap back on! The funnel works well do it at a slight angle and it's great, the temperature of the flask won't stay cold long if it's in you back pocket
customer_reviews.author: Ryan M.

customer_reviews.title: and it looks super slick for the price
customer_reviews.text: I just received this flask in the mail, and it looks super slick for the price. Pretty no non sense flask that will get the job done :)
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict

customer_reviews.title: HaHaHaHaHa!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a very nice flask that I used to bring iced tea to a restaurant when my sweetie complained of the cost of tea in restaurants. The small funnel was tough to use, I have a funnel that works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Foster

customer_reviews.title: Terrible cap and hinge design
customer_reviews.text: How this product got so many great reviews is beyond me. I have yet to be able to screw the cap back on. The hinge isn't elevated making screwing the cap on very difficult, if not impossible. I'm returning it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Dave V.

customer_reviews.title: Great pocket size flask!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a replacement. The previous one lasted forever, but it got lost during my recent move. It's a great flask. Perfect for back pocket or jacket chest pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Flask
customer_reviews.text: Lol the memories. I really do like this flask though. The matte black finish looks and feels nice. And it’s the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Stewart

customer_reviews.title: ... in October and it works as advertised and looks good. Just the right size to fit in my ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this back in October and it works as advertised and looks good. Just the right size to fit in my back pocket. The reason for the four stars was there were a few small scratches on top.
customer_reviews.author: David Ceboll

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Water tight, large, and leaves no taste. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Oaotay

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Soild flask and the black make is easily to stay discreet.
customer_reviews.author: DGD

customer_reviews.title: This flask is excellent quality. I pop over to my neighbors for ...
customer_reviews.text: I read lots of reviews before buying this flask. I hoped their claims of high quality stainless steel were accurate. THEY ARE! This flask is excellent quality. I pop over to my neighbors for dinner from time to time and bring my own booze. This is perfect for a few drinks, and I don't have to bring a huge bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Entry-Level Flask
customer_reviews.text: For the price, its great. No, the finish isn't as smooth as it could be and no, the welds aren't perfect. But it doesn't leak and for under $15, the finish is actually pretty dang good, especially on the top and bottom. The cap opens and closes very smoothly and it holds a generous 8 ounces of your choice beverage. You couldn't ask for much more at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Brockman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to hid and holds a decentry amount. Great for weddings, kids recitals, or even work

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy cheep
customer_reviews.text: CRAP!!! This thing turned my favorite bourbon BLACK.. yuck!! It’s cheaply made. Don’t buy.

customer_reviews.title: Gave to hubby as a gift. He loves it ...
customer_reviews.text: Gave to hubby as a gift. He loves it! Just the right size, loves the color and doesn't leak. Winner, winner!

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift idea .
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift but I was told that he loves it !

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty flask and does the job - no leaks, easy to use

customer_reviews.title: Solid, quality built product
customer_reviews.text: Solid built little flask. I had it leather wrapped by Kaseyjean leather designs, and it’s been perfect. Easily customizable, durable, and a must have for any wedding.

customer_reviews.text: It is a pretty good product just disappointed because I did not receive the funnel for it which was one of the reasons why I bought this one.

customer_reviews.title: No complaints at all!
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly as described. It doesn't leak. And they've fixed it so that it will easily stand. Last, it came in a box that was so nice, my wife kept it to re-use as a gift-box.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love it. The funnel is helpful so that you dont spill your liquor. And you can keep your alcohol in it more than a couple of days. It doesn't leak which is great!

customer_reviews.title: Quality Flask I especially liked the metal strap that holds the cap so you ...
customer_reviews.text: Quality Flask I especially liked the metal strap that holds the cap so you would not loose it. All around I have found some very nice items on Amazon if you take the time to read the reviews and product description thoroughly Some reviews are bogus , this one is not and this is a very nice Flask.

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, can not wait to try it out in the field.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for my husband for Christmas. Matte black was perfect. Has held up well so far.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great for tooling around in town. Fits great in either front or rear jeans pocket.

customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my brother and it looks nicer in person than it does on the picture. Its a good size and it came with a nice bag for it too!

customer_reviews.title: Very cool, contemporary look
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Clean look and feel and easy to fill. Not sure how the finish will standup over the years, but so far so good!

customer_reviews.title: Was not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Description was complete lies first off it only holds 7 ounces is not stainless steel and started to rust after a couple days

customer_reviews.text: No leaks, easy to refill, and holds a good amount of liquor.

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Flask was as described. Mine had a few knicks on the surface of the cap but nothing big.

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: This was sent as a gift. He really likes it.

customer_reviews.title: I like it. But I wonder if it's really stainless ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it. But I wonder if it's really stainless steel inside as my whiskey gets a dark tainted color after a few days in flask.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It came with an opening in the bottom seam. In other words, a leak.

customer_reviews.title: Worth spending more!
customer_reviews.text: Very solid, high quality. No leaks yet and it doesnt distort taste. Overall great so far. Have had cheap flasks in the past, and can definitely say its worth paying for better steel and a more sealed container

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality flask

customer_reviews.title: and she loved it.
customer_reviews.text: I gave the Flask to my sister for Christmas,and she loved it.

customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Purchased as a gift. They were pleasantly pleased.

customer_reviews.title: Great for watercolor.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for taking water into the field for water color painting.

customer_reviews.text: Great gift for a swap with co workers. We did a whit elephant swap and it was stolen more than once.

customer_reviews.title: ... gift from my brother-in-law and I think he will love it!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a gift from my brother-in-law and I think he will love it!

customer_reviews.title: It's a really great flask, no leak
customer_reviews.text: It's a really great flask, no leak, no rust, great large size, very classy and fits in my coat pocket.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice product.... my Boyfriend is very pleased! The matte black is cool and different - gift was a success!

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality, and the matte black color is great!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. Brought it to a dance last night and did not have to bring a whole bottle just to enjoy a few drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Familyman User

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item (8oz size) & like it, it's well built, the inside was clean, nothing came out when I rinsed it with vinegar first then tequila. Quality product, they use the top grade stainless. I like the large size that will fit in front pants pocket comfortable. Back pocket also if not sitting. I plan to buy a 4 oz size for my wife and also to see if the 4oz size will fit into a shirt pocket. These are so handy to richen up a weak restaurant cocktail or to put in your ginger ale at a party.
customer_reviews.author: JR233

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: it's certainly not ''premium''. just another flask. also they didnt give me the funnel
customer_reviews.author: Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Showed up with holes in it
customer_reviews.text: It showed up with 2 pin holes in the bottom. I would not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Belanger

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with my purchase. It is definitely a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: False advertisement. The flask leaks!
customer_reviews.text: When I first received the product I thought it was great and it looked nice too. Then I actually tried to put it to use, and realized that the flask was leaking. Basically this flask is useless since it leaks. No matter how nice it looks...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One and done.
customer_reviews.text: The cap broke after the first use and I was not even remotely hard on it. I kept it in my coat pocket for one evening and the piece that fixes the cap to the flask ended up breaking. Granted it's still functional, but the last thing I want is for the cap to actually break and leak bourbon in my nice coat or jacket. Bottom line, avoid. Spend a little extra and get a decent one that will last you.
customer_reviews.author: AKC

customer_reviews.title: Not Leak Proof (at least mine).
customer_reviews.text: I filled the flask with liquid, but because of past experiences I placed it in a zip lock bag. Good thing I did. Perhaps I need to start using cheap 5 cent zip lock bags instead of trying to find a "leak proof" flask? Sad, but true.
customer_reviews.author: Believer

customer_reviews.title: Three of ten leaked and no response from seller to refund request
customer_reviews.text: I bought ten, paid $15 each for engraving, gave them as gifts, then heard back from three that they were leaking. I tried to get a refund, but they seller never responded. 30% leak rate seems high for supposedly strong higher quality flask.
customer_reviews.author: Stinker T

customer_reviews.title: No thanks!!
customer_reviews.text: Found what appears to be metal flakes in top of cap. Due to the rough thread finishing inside the cap, the possibility remained of future steel flakes forming and potentially falling into liquid contents.
customer_reviews.author: NB

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money
customer_reviews.text: Solid stainless steel construction, nice matte black finish on the grip. Fits perfectly in a flat pocket of the small cross-body bag I use on hikes. Not advertised as insulated, but the stainless steel keeps water cold for hours. There is a metallic taste to the water, but it seems to be fading with time. Excellent quality for $10. One negative: the rounded edges at the bottom make it very difficult to stand up on its own - I have to wedge it between two things on the counter to fill it from a bottle of cold water. If it had a flat bottom I would give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hutcherson

customer_reviews.title: Well made and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The flask seems to be well made and sturdy. Cap is all metal and does not leak at all..... The only caution I would mention is when putting the cap on go slow, it is easy to cross thread and that would produce leaking. Practice helps... Great flask
customer_reviews.author: MrSteve

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE HAZARDOUS TO YOUR HEALTH
customer_reviews.text: Beware not food grade stainless leaves metal taste after only a short time Also found tiny dark pieces coming out of flask ,this is made in China and is garbage ,I wanted one made in USA but could not find one really sorry I bought this Don't waste your time or money Hope it doesn't make me sick ,Food grade Stainless would have not left a strong metal taste
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This flask leaks
customer_reviews.text: This flask leaked coming and going in my checked luggage, the first time i used it. It is one of the more expensive flasks, too, which I thought would make it better quality -- NOT!! I would not recommend it to anyone. Do you have a recommendation for a leakproof flask?
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Should work fine.
customer_reviews.text: Just got delivered 30 minutes ago. The box it came in was smashed which worried me a little but the flask seems to be in great shape. Filled it with water and there isn’t any leaking. The cap threads on nice and easy. The one thing i worry about is the hinge on the piece that holds the cap. Other than that this seems to be a decent little flask. I think it’s worth 15 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Devin P.

customer_reviews.title: Get drunk with class
customer_reviews.text: Hey just because you plan to get drunk doesn’t mean you can’t do it with a little class. It works well although the screw on cap can be a little tricky.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Esposito

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, the steel is food grade and looks and feels great. Serves its purpose well.
customer_reviews.author: EGagne

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: Man, this is just what I needed. One thing a real man should always possess (maybe not always carry) is a good ole flask. Great quality and a nice matte finish.
customer_reviews.author: Drewski

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of the several that I ordered had a leak in the weld. Otherwise a 5-star product.

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my bf as more of a joke gift. He does use it when he travels and loves it

customer_reviews.title: doesn't even stand
customer_reviews.text: This flask is a complete piece of garbage the bottom is uneven so is won't stand, it is not leak proof, it dents easily and the arm that the cap is connected to is made of plastic. It is a horrible product and is not worth the money

customer_reviews.title: Leaks,check immediately
customer_reviews.text: Bought this and undamaged out of box it leaks from seam on bottom. Returned.

customer_reviews.title: Use it every day
customer_reviews.text: Good looking and functional. I really like it. The bottom could be a little flatter but not a big problem.
customer_reviews.author: Rick L.

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Have no issues with this product. Fit and finish is great. No leaks,dings,scratches or screw top problems. Purchased 2 more after receiving the first. Very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: PJ73USAF

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works fine, does not leak. It is a little hard to clean.
customer_reviews.author: G. F.

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: This has proved to be a great buy. Perfect size, and well made.
customer_reviews.author: James C. Hirschinger

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for, good size, well constructed, nice finish and good value
customer_reviews.author: Shamanic Voyages

product_meta.title: Premium 8 oz Black, Leakproof, Flask - Highest Food Grade (304) Stainless Steel - Liquor Hip Flasks - Free Bonus Funnel and Black Gift Box (Matte Black, 8 Ounce)
product_meta.description:
Package Quantity:1| Color:Matte Black (8oz)

Premium Matte Black Stainless Steel Hip Flask 304 (18/8 Food Grade Quality) - Includes Free Bonus Funnel and Black Gift Box

Features:

 Food Grade 18/8 304 Stainless Steel Flask

 High Quality Corrosion and Rust Resistant

 Precision Laser Welded Seams

 Tested Leak Proof

 Cap is attached with swing-arm so it can't be lost "Captive Top"

 Free Bonus Funnel and Black Gift Box

 Perfect 8oz flask for men or women

 Satisfaction Guaranteed!

ECO-Friendly and BPA FREE: Stop using plastic containers or the lower quality flasks that are made of sub standard materials or are poorly manufactured. Other, cheaper flasks using 18/10 Stainless Steel can lead to leaching, rust and corrosion of the interior metal and you potentially ingesting toxic metals.
